orvel Skydark was a hunter of the village of Maskyrs Eye in the Vast in the midâ€“14 century DR.
He was the brother of Torst Skydark.
Torvel and Torst hailed from Thentia in the Moonsea North, but both had settled in Maskyrs Eye by 1357 DR, where they took up work as hunters.
